amendment.description: To provide additional funding for programs under the Ryan White Care Act.

action.text: Amendment SA 1598 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1598 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 335.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1598 made in Senate.
Point of order under the Budget Act raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1598.
Amendment SA 1598 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11228-11229; text: CR S11228) To provide additional funding for programs under the Ryan White Care Act.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 1598 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 53. Record Vote Number: 335.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1598 proposed by Senator Schumer to Amendment SA 1542.
